header: You can have the location of your MAS sidebands shown in your spectra. Enter the MAS rate in the General tab of the Spectrum Properties pop-up (double-click on the spectrum in the sidebar). Then switch on the MAS sidebands, either for a single spectrum with right-click / Customise / Show MAS Sidebands or for all spectra in the Spectrum tab of your Preferences (go to File / Preferences).
